trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for views that define the appearance of data in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base para as vistas que definem o aspeto dos dados num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode is derived from the ViewBase class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>modo de visualização é derivado da classe de ViewBase.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You typically use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control to lay out data in columns.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente utiliza um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>controlo a apresentar dados nas colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the ViewBase class to create custom view modes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Também pode utilizar a classe de ViewBase criar modos de vista personalizada para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property defines the view mode that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control uses.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>propriedade define o modo de vista que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>controlar utiliza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Removes all bindings and styling that are set for an item.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os enlaces e estilo que estão definidos para um item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to remove settings from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> para remover as definições do.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the style for the view mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que estão associado com o estilo para o modo de visualização.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not overridden by a derived class, the style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control is used as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade não é substituída por uma classe derivada, o estilo para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>controlo é utilizado como o estilo predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set the style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para definir o estilo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The style to use for the view mode.
trans-unit.target: O estilo a utilizar para o modo de vista.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o estilo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Is called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.
trans-unit.target: É chamado quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> controlo cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer> first uses the properties and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern> objects that are implemented by the specified view, before using the default properties and patterns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer>utiliza primeiro as propriedades e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern>objetos que estão implementados pela vista especificada, antes de utilizar as propriedades predefinidas e padrões que estão definidos para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control to use to create the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> controlo a utilizar para criar o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"></xref> interface that implements the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> interface que implementa o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> para personalizadas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the style to use for the items in the view mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo a utilizar para os itens no modo de vista.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set the style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para definir o estilo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: The style of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estilo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o estilo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Prepares an item in the view for display, by setting bindings and styles.
trans-unit.target: Prepara um item na vista para apresentar, definindo estilos e enlaces.

trans-unit.source: The item to prepare for display.
trans-unit.target: O item a preparar para apresentação.
